item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:6, topic:371870”]mitb ppl make no sense.

and i guess my art is a little newbie but idk my opinion is bland.

tabby what would the world do without your amazing knowledge of the average forum user :)[/quote]he was saying your work is ugly

and a little newbie? what exactly was difficult about any of the banners you produced? looks like you mostly just used some tool for the background then put font on top

item.title: Adobe Creations V2 (art i did for some forums)
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:3, topic:371870”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=467935.msg3421179#msg3421179 date=1291522172]
Is the second last one supposed to say “Zero comfort?”
[/quote]
No, Zerocomfor is some forum, it’s linked to in his sig.[/quote]
No no. He gets what Zerocomfor is but he is expressing it by saying the second to last pic is ugly looking hence ‘Zero Comfort’

Read full topic
